statements.query: MATCH (c:ProxmoxCluster) WHERE c.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH c DETACH DELETE c
MATCH (n:ProxmoxNode) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n DETACH DELETE n
MATCH (v:ProxmoxVM) WHERE v.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH v DETACH DELETE v
MATCH (d:ProxmoxDisk) WHERE d.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH d DETACH DELETE d
MATCH (i:ProxmoxNetworkInterface) WHERE i.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH i DETACH DELETE i
MATCH (s:ProxmoxStorage) WHERE s.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH s DETACH DELETE s
